protein.specific_function: Removes terminal alpha-N-acetylgalactosamine residues from glycolipids and glycopeptides. Required for the breakdown of glycolipids.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on glycosyl bonds

reference.reference_text: Wang AM, Bishop DF, Desnick RJ: Human alpha-N-acetylgalactosaminidase-molecular cloning, nucleotide sequence, and expression of a full-length cDNA.
